aFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["RV_univ_MPRA","CGACGCTCTTCCGATCT"],["FWD_mScar_Tn7_10UMI_3","GTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGNNNNNNNNNNTCGACCGCAAGTTGGAC"],["FWD_CRS_Tn7","GTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGTGTATAAGAGACAGCCAGGACCGGATCAACT"],["P5NEXTPT5","AATGATACGGCGACCACCGAGATCTACACTCTTTCCCTACACGACGCTCTTCCG*A*T*C*T"],["Ad2.1_TAAGGCGA","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATTCGCCTTAGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.2_CGTACTAG","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCTAGTACGGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.3_AGGCAGAA","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATTTCTGCCTGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.4_TCCTGAGC","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATGCTCAGGAGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.6_TAGGCATG","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCATGCCTAGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.7_CTCTCTAC","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATGTAGAGAGGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.8_CAGAGAGG","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCCTCTCTGGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.9_GCTACGCT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATAGCGTAGCGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.10_CGAGGCTG","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCAGCCTCGGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.11_AAGAGGCA","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATTGCCTCTTGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.12_GTAGAGGA","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATTCCTCTACGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.13_GTCGTGAT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATATCACGACGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.14_ACCACTGT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATACAGTGGTGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.15_TGGATCTG","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATCAGATCCAGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.16_CCGTTTGT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATACAAACGGGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.17_TGCTGGGT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATACCCAGCAGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"],["Ad2.18_GAGGGGTT","CAAGCAGAAGACGGCATACGAGATAACCCCTCGTCTCGTGGGCTCGGAGATGT"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1dbv4","text":"Pellet sorted nuclei in a 1.5 mL tube at 2500 x g, 4°C for 3min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hin2","text":"Resuspend pellet in 1X ProtK digestion buffer (95 µL nuclease free water, 95 µL 2X digestion buffer, 10 µL Proteinase K)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"24co2","text":"Preheat a ThermoMixer to 55°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"836es","text":"Incubate at 55°C, 600 rpm for 1h. (Proteinase K digestion)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"caulc","text":"In the meantime, preheat another ThermoMixer to 65°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7lcot","text":"Incubate at 65°C, 600 rpm for 15min. (Reverse Crosslinking)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9glkm","text":"Centrifuge at maximum speed for 3min. (Get rid of cell debris)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2s4ng","text":"In the meantime, set the 2 ThermoMixers to 37°C and 26°C, respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bgal","text":"Continue with the Quick-DNA/RNA Microprep Plus Kit following the manufacturer's protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b8fek","text":"Perform in-column DNase digest for the RNA samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ah3f","text":"Add to each RNA sample:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nfd0","text":"1.5 µL TURBO DNase buffer (10X)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjt95","text":"1 µL TURBO DNase","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cchq5","text":"Incubate at 37°C, 600rpm for 20min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lr37","text":"For DNA samples: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1ps3","text":"Elute in 21 µL nuclease free water. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pgdr","text":"Measure DNA concentration with the Qubit™ dsDNA HS Assay Kit, using 1 µL DNA.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jap4","text":"Freeze at -20°C for later use.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3db3b","text":"For RNA samples: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4hqe","text":"Elute in 15 µL nuclease free water.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43fmi","text":"Continue with TURBO DNase digestion and Reverse Transcription.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7s8pk","text":"Transfer supernatant (190 µL) to a new tube, add 190 µL RNA/DNA lysis buffer (from Quick-DNA/RNA Microprep Plus Kit) and mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35rrg","text":"Add 2 µL inactivation reagent to each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h0s7","text":"Incubate at 26°C, 1600rpm for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6fntq","text":"Transfer each sample to 0.5 mL tubes (critical, allows better aspiration of supernatant).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap2l8","text":"Centrifuge at 10'000 x g for 90s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ba5jq","text":"Aspirate the supernatant (15 µL). Do not take up any inactivation reagent!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l8l7","text":"Measure RNA concentration with the Qubit™ RNA HS Assay Kit, using 1 µL RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bnd2","text":"Optional: Determine the RIN value by analyzing the RNA samples with the RNA 6000 Pico Kit, following the manufacturer's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4bph","text":"Use 12 µL RNA for Reverse Transcription. For that, set up the following reaction in 0.2 mL PCR tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vc9d","text":"12 µL RNA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1rsb","text":"1.5 µL dNTP mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o5ma","text":"1.5 µL Oligo(dT)18 Primer ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs27","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bpggd","text":"Incubate in a thermocycler with heated lid:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6euop","text":"5min at 65°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eo0n7","text":"Place reaction on ice for 1min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5e4ul","text":"Add 15 µL 2X RT mix to each sample (6 µL 5X RT buffer, 7.5 µL nuclease free water, 1 µL Maxima H- RT, 0.5 µL RNasin plus).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"579va","text":"Incubate in a thermocycler with heated lid:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69ocm","text":"30min at 50°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9rtdf","text":"5min at 85°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"721de","text":"Transfer each sample to a DNA low binding 1.5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r6bh","text":"Clean up the cDNA with 1.5X vol. (= 45 µL) of AMPure XP magnetic beads following the manufacturer's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eihks","text":"Elute the cleaned cDNA in 21 µL nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlh5v","text":"Freeze cDNA at -20°C for later use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87ku5","text":"In the two subsequent sections, DNA sequencing libraries are generated from both DNA and cDNA (RNA) samples. This is done in the exact same way for both sample types. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8s5s0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7bqpn","text":"In this first PCR, UMIs are attached by 3 PCR cycles. Primer binding sites are in the C-terminal part of mScarlet-I (FWD_mScar_Tn7_10UMI_3) and immediately downstream of the 12bp barcode (RV_univ_MPRA). The fragment created in this PCR has a length of 196bp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fothc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60k99","text":"Set up the following PCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd61t","text":"17 µL DNA/cDNA from step    and step   , respectively","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cgg1o","text":"3 µL nuclease free water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ru19","text":"2.5 µL primer FWD_mScar_Tn7_10UMI_3 (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9p74","text":"2.5 µL primer RV_univ_MPRA (10µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71j0h","text":"25 µL NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9r1cg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i5eg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57id7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"83548700FE9111EBB0E6214659513C45","id":0,"step_guid":"895C8B10FE7E11EB82382F10FF0269F1","title":""}},"1":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8BA484A0FE9111EBB0E6214659513C45","id":0,"step_guid":"F8841930FE8E11EBB0E6214659513C45","title":""}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7poki","text":"Don't use all 20 µL of cDNA: Leave 3 µL of cDNA for qPCR on marker genes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12qoa","text":"Incubate in a PCR cycler with heated lid:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sdnc","text":"30s - 98°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cdak","text":"3 cycles (10s - 98°C; 30s - 65°C; 1min - 72°C)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26r2m","text":"5min - 72°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1541","text":"hold - 4°C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fitpf","text":"Transfer each sample to a DNA low binding 1.5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vg5u","text":"Clean up each sample with 1.2X vol. (= 60 µL) of AMPure XP magnetic beads following the manufacturer's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24qo","text":"Elute in 20 µL nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4q3vi","text":"The library amplification step is split up in 2 separate PCRs. In the first PCR, the P7 illumina adapter is added. Then, in the remaining cycles, also the P5 illumina adapter is added. By splitting up the library amplification in two PCRs (with a total of 20-30 cycles, depending on input), the likelihood of primer dimer formation is drastically reduced in low-input samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51n0b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4bmn","text":"Set up the following PCR reaction:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vvg7","text":"20 µL sample from step  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"575iu","text":"2.5 µL primer Ad2.X_index (2µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5pf7t","text":"2.5 µL primer RV_univ_MPRA (2µM stock)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bqp0","text":"25 µL NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5drtt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D0BAB010FE9511EBB0E6214659513C45","id":0,"step_guid":"F1968A60FE9111EBB0E6214659513C45","title":""}}}}
